text: 8:28 Jon 3:11; 3:14; 5:19; 5:30; 12:32; Rom 1:4Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia Gumazamizibar Otarim fɨva ter ighuvimɨn aneguragh, egh ia kamaghɨn fogh, Kɨ Uabɨ Kɨ Kamaghɨn Iti. Egh kamaghɨn fogh, kɨ uabɨ uan nɨghnɨzimɨn gɨn ghua bizitam gamir pu. Puvatɨ. Afeziam na mɨkemezir akabara, kɨ darara gun mɨgei.
